articles.title: Joshua O.S. Hunt

            General Info
            Joshua Hunt is an assistant professor at Mississippi State University in the accounting department. He teaches accounting systems 2, which is transitioning to an introduction to accounting data analytics, and he teaches a masters level accounting data analytics course. He has is married with two boys under 2 and he loves it.
            
            
            Education
            
            University of Arkansas
            PhD in Accounting | 2013-2018
            MS in Analytics and Statistics | 2017
            MS in Accounting | 2012
            
            
            Louisiana Tech University
            MAT in Teaching | 2009-2010
            BS in Mathematics | 2004-2008
            
            
            
            Research Interests
            
            Data Analytics
            Machine Learning, Model evaluation, Robotic Process Automation, and Communication
            
            
            Accounting
            Earnings/Return Relation, Audit Quality, and Methodology
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Joshua O.S. Hunt
